column4: Judge says no 'glue' to hold together Microsoft sex bias claims
column5: A federal judge in Seattle has denied class certification in a lawsuit claiming that Microsoft Corp discriminated against more than 8 600 women in pay and promotions  saying the tech giant largely left employment decisions to individual managers.

column4: Norway denies holding up Tesla move to improve service
column5: OSLO Norway has rejected a suggestion it is holding up Tesla's  efforts to improve service in its third-biggest market  saying the electric carmaker has not yet applied to use the mobile service vans it says it needs to solve its problems.

column4: Norway denies holding up Tesla move to improve service
column5: OSLO  July 9 Norway has rejected a suggestion it is holding up Tesla's efforts to improve service in its third-biggest market  saying the electric carmaker has not yet applied to use the mobile service vans it says it needs to solve its problems.
